create_account_description: Create your account and continue your journey with us
login_description: Access your account and continue your journey with us
too_many_requests: Too many failed requests. Please try again later.
failed_create_account: Failed to create your account. Please try again.
signin_failed: Sign in failed. Please try again.
network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
verification_email_sent: Verification email sent! Check your inbox and spam folder.
google_oauth_not_configured: Google OAuth is not configured. Please contact support.
google_auth_failed: Google authentication failed, Something went wrong
broker_quote: The future of real estate brokerage is here. Seamless, efficient, and professional.
company_quote: Scale your brokerage firm with powerful management tools and real-time insights.
welcome_back_login: Welcome back, please login to your account.
create_account_start: Create your account to get started.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
reset_link_sent_desc: We have sent a password reset link to your email address.
forgot_password_desc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
check_spam_folder: Can't find it? Check your spam or junk folder.
max_attempts_reached: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
account_not_found_desc: We couldn't find an account with this email address.
create_account_suggestion: Would you like to create a new account instead?
label_continue_draft: Continue where you left off and complete your property listings
label_details_placeholder: Share any details that help us investigate.
toast_new_property_submitted: New property created and submitted successfully
toast_report_submitted: Thanks for reporting. We'll review this property soon.
toast_error_property_create: Failed to create property. Please try again.
toast_error_property_delete: An unknown error occurred while deleting the property.
toast_error_property_submit: Failed to submit property. Please try again.
toast_error_property_draft: An unknown error occurred while saving the property as draft.
toast_error_pdf_export: Failed to export PDF. Please try again.
toast_error_enquiry_create: Failed to create enquiry. Please try again.
toast_error_enquiry_delete: An unknown error occurred while deleting the enquiry.
toast_error_enquiry_close: Failed to close enquiry. Please try again.
toast_error_fill_required: Please fill in all required fields.
toast_error_complete_fields: Please complete all required fields before submitting.
toast_error_proceed_fields: Please fill in all required fields before proceeding.
toast_error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
toast_error_relogin_password: Please log out and log in again to set a password
toast_error_leave_reason: Please share a valid reason (max 500 characters).
toast_error_broker_add: Failed to add broker. Please try again.
toast_error_notification_read: Failed to mark notification as read
toast_error_report_submit: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
toast_error_rate_higher: Offer rate cannot be higher than the asking rate
toast_error_total_higher: Offer total cannot be higher than the asking total
toast_error_select_date_time: Please select both a date and a time slot
toast_error_profile_incomplete: Please complete your profile to use bookmarks
toast_error_user_not_found: User or broker data not found
toast_error_load_properties: Failed to load properties. Please try again later.
empty_no_properties_desc: We couldn't find any properties matching your criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
empty_no_listings_desc: You haven't listed any properties yet, or no properties match your current filters.
empty_no_matching_properties: No properties found matching your criteria.
empty_no_enquiries_desc: We couldn't find any enquiries matching your search.
empty_no_matching_enquiries: No enquiries found matching your criteria.
empty_no_contacts_search: No contacts match '{{query}}'. Try a different search term.
empty_no_contacts_desc: Contacts will appear here when you receive enquiries or property inquiries.
empty_no_news_search: We couldn't find any news matching '{{search}}'. Try adjusting your search or filters.
empty_no_news_desc: No news articles are available at the moment. Please check back later.
empty_no_proposed_properties: No properties have been proposed yet.
empty_no_matching_properties_enquiry_des: You don't have any active properties that match this enquiry. Try creating a new one!
access_restricted_property: You don't have permission to view this property. This property may be private or you may not be associated with it.
access_restricted_desc: You don't have permission to view this property.
confirm_delete_contact_desc: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
confirm_remove_broker_desc: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your company? This action cannot be undone.
confirm_close_enquiry_desc: Are you sure you want to close this enquiry? This action cannot be undone. Type {{id}} to confirm.
flag_property_desc: Tell us what seems wrong so we can review this listing.
share_contact_desc: Share your contact details with the user who made the offer. Pick a time when you are available for a call.
filter_properties_desc: Use filters to find properties that match your requirements.
offer_final_desc: This is your last chance to make an offer on this property. If rejected, you won't be able to submit another offer.
offer_desc: Submit your best offer for this property. If rejected, you will have one chance to submit a final offer.
offer_accepted_desc: Congratulations! Your offer has been accepted. We will contact you shortly.
offer_final_pending_desc: Your final offer is under review. This is your last attempt.
offer_final_accepted_desc: Congratulations! Your final offer has been accepted.
offer_final_rejected_desc: You cannot submit more offers for this property.
offer_higher_than_asking: Offer cannot be higher than asking rate.
offer_total_higher_than_asking: Offer total cannot be higher than asking total.
property_pending_removal: This property is scheduled to be removed from the platform soon.
enquiry_not_found: Error loading enquiry details or enquiry not found.
error_loading: Failed to load. Please try again.
your_listing_created: Your listing has been successfully created
validation_address_min: Address must be at least 5 characters
validation_description_min: Description must be at least 20 characters
validation_featured_media_url: Featured media must be a valid URL
validation_images_required: At least one image is required
